column1: * 1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Agatha Carew Hunt.
* 1979 - The Jackanory episode "Out of the Frying-Pan and Into the Fire" is aired on the BBC.
* 1999 - Poems from The Hobbit is published.
** The Disaster of the Gladden Fields
*** Death of Isildur and his sons Elendur (son of Isildur)
